meanings.definition: Fail to experience or be included in something.
meanings.sent1: I always missout on the fun when I stay home.
meanings.sent2: Don't missout on the chance to try something new.
meanings.sent3: I tend to missout on surprises because I like to plan everything.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she would missout on life if she didn't take risks.
meanings.sent5: If you missout on this opportunity, you might regret it later.

meanings.definition: To be left out or excluded from an event or opportunity.
meanings.sent1: My friend tends to missout on group activities due to her busy schedule.
meanings.sent2: I don't want anyone to missout on the celebration.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked sad as if it would missout on the party.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she would missout on the adventure if she didn't join.
meanings.sent5: Don't let anyone missout on the fun; invite them along!
